description:
Seira escapes the Room of Discipline to save Gejutel, but is forced to fight Rozaria, and Regis also heads for the castle to save Gejutel but is stopped by Karias. M-21, Tao, and Takio work together to hold off Rael so that Raizel and Franken can get to the Sanctuary. Fierce battles are breaking out everywhere in response to Raskreia`s final decision to force Gejutel into eternal sleep...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Subete wa, Masashiku Aru Tame ni / Execution
That All May Be as It Should Be / Execution
全ては, 正しくあるために / Execution
